description:
Rabi-Ribi is a hybrid Bullet-Hell Metroidvania developped by CreSpirit and GameYue,
released in 2016. It follows bunny-girl Erina and her fairy companion Ribbon in this
cute, action-packed, and possibly pretty difficult adventure.

1.4.2.description:
## Quick Links
- [Game Info Page](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/blob/main/worlds/rabi_ribi/docs/en_Rabi-Ribi.md)
- [Setup Guide](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/blob/main/worlds/rabi_ribi/docs/setup_beta_en.md)
- [Known Issues](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3Abug)

## Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.

## What's Changed
* Logic Fixes by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/73
* Update Package APWorld to use builtin Build APWorlds function. by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/74


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/beta-1.4.1...1.4.2
1.4.2.title: Rabi-Ribi APWorld 1.4.2

- [Known Issues](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3Abug)

## Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.

## What's Changed
* Fix issues found in fuzz testing by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/80
* Clean up options by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/81
* Fix Various Constraint Issues by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/82

1.4.5.title: Rabi-Ribi APWorld 1.4.5

alpha.description:
## To install:
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [archipelago releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \lib\worlds under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **rabi_ribi.apworld** into this folder.

## To generate a game:
1. Download **RabiRibi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \players under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **RabiRibi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Navigate back to your archipelago base folder and run **ArchipelagoGenerate.exe**
7. Your generated game will be in the \output folder under the archipelago base folder.

## To host a game:
1. Navigate to the [host game url](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
2. Upload the zip file outputted from the above "To generate a game"

## To start playing:
1. Make sure you have an AP room from the previous "To host a game".
2. Navigate to your archipelago base folder (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
3. Run **ArchipelagoLauncher.exe** and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
4. Connect to the room via the room URL.
5. Launch Rabi-Ribi.
6. The logger should state something like "connect to <numbers>-<player-name> to start playing."
7. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the log above.
8. Start and have fun!
alpha.title: AP Rabi-Ribi Alpha-1.0.0

alpha-1.0.2.description:
## To install:
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [archipelago releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \lib\worlds under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **rabi_ribi.apworld** into this folder.

## To generate a game:
1. Download **RabiRibi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \players under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **RabiRibi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Navigate back to your archipelago base folder and run **ArchipelagoGenerate.exe**
7. Your generated game will be in the \output folder under the archipelago base folder.

## To host a game:
1. Navigate to the [host game url](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
2. Upload the zip file outputted from the above "To generate a game"

## To start playing:
1. Make sure you have an AP room from the previous "To host a game".
2. Navigate to your archipelago base folder (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
3. Run **ArchipelagoLauncher.exe** and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
4. On your first launch, the client should ask you to select your **Rabi-Ribi install folder** on steam (this can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder).
6. Connect to the room via the room URL.
7. Launch Rabi-Ribi (currently, only the latest version 2.0.1 is supported).
8. The logger should state something like "connect to <numbers>-<player-name> to start playing."
9. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the log above.
10. Start and have fun!

## Changelog:
- Fixed bug where game gives you an item too soon after save relead, resulting in black screen and lag
- Fix bug where exclamation points are not removed outside of area0 after collection
- Put order of operations on exclamation point removal, so that the animation doesnt trigger twice
- Embed scenario id into map file, and dont allow AP client loop to run while the user is not on the correct scenario.
- Remove unused extra locations, to be included in later updates via settings
- Fix the client to handle cases where theres less locations than the max.
- Fix bug where local items disappears after pickup if loading a previous save

## To host a game:

## To start playing:

2. Navigate to your archipelago base folder (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).

## Changelog:
- Fix bug where game re-gives items on warp.
- Fix bug where client processes datapackage packet before connect packet, resulting in variables that aren't set yet.
- Fix bug where locations_checked isnt reset between client reconnects.
- Fix crash when receiving an item which starts a cutscene during the select costume menu

- Add Super / Hyper Attack Mode
- Remove print when unable to find item location after detecting item
alpha-1.1.4.title: AP Rabi-Ribi Alpha-1.1.4

alpha-1.1.5.description:
## To install:
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [archipelago releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \lib\worlds under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **rabi_ribi.apworld** into this folder.

## To generate a game:
1. Download **RabiRibi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \players under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **RabiRibi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Navigate back to your archipelago base folder and run **ArchipelagoGenerate.exe**
7. Your generated game will be in the \output folder under the archipelago base folder.

## To host a game:
1. Navigate to the [host game url](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
2. Upload the zip file outputted from the above "To generate a game"

## To start playing:
1. Make sure you have an AP room from the previous "To host a game".
2. Navigate to your archipelago base folder (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
3. Run **ArchipelagoLauncher.exe** and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
4. On your first launch, the client should ask you to select your **Rabi-Ribi install folder** on steam (this can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder).
6. Connect to the room via the room URL.
7. Launch Rabi-Ribi (currently, only the latest version 2.0.1 is supported).
8. The logger should state something like "connect to <numbers>-<player-name> to start playing."
9. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the log above.
10. Start and have fun!

## Other Notes:
Currently, the the only goal the randomizer supports is "Collect 5 Eggs," which are all local! The goal is NOT to complete the base game (although there is intention to add this later).

## Changelog:
- Added "Encourage Eggs In Late Spheres" option
- Added "Carrot Shooter In Logic" option
- Small bug fixes in logic

alpha-1.2.0.title: alpha-1.2.0

alpha-1.2.1.description:
# Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, it is assumed that the player knows of hidden Ribbon block paths throughout the game. While this steam guide does not cover all of them, it should still be useful: [Rabi-Ribi Main / Post Game: Non-Linear Style](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=612667311)

## To Install:
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [archipelago releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to custom_worlds under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **rabi_ribi.apworld** into this folder.

## To Generate a Game:
1. Download **RabiRibi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \players under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **RabiRibi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Navigate back to your archipelago base folder and run **ArchipelagoGenerate.exe**
7. Your generated game will be in the \output folder under the archipelago base folder.

## To Host a Game:
1. Navigate to the [host game url](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
2. Upload the zip file outputted from the above "To generate a game"

## To Start Playing:
1. Make sure you have an AP room from the previous "To host a game".
2. Navigate to your archipelago base folder (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
3. Run **ArchipelagoLauncher.exe** and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
4. On your first launch, the client should ask you to select your **Rabi-Ribi install folder** on steam (this can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder).
6. Connect to the room via the room URL.
7. Launch Rabi-Ribi (currently, only the latest version 2.0.1 is supported).
8. The logger should state something like `connect to <numbers>-<player-name> to start playing`.
9. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the log above.
10. Start and have fun!

## Other Notes:
At this time, the only goal this randomizer supports is "Collect 5 Eggs," which are all local! The goal is NOT to complete the base game (although there is intention to add this later).

## What's Changed:
* Add option to consider event warps in logic by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/7
* Uptake latest standalone randomizer changes by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/8
* Add Start Location shuffle by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/9
* Make locations collectable for player's own "Nothing" by @AMintyDragon in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/10
* Add option to warp anywhere by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/11
* Include additional items and locations in the pool by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/12
* Fix several bugs by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/13
* Fix Easter Eggs sometimes not being detected as collected by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/14

## New Contributors
* @AMintyDragon made their first contribution in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/alpha-1.2.0...alpha-1.2.1
alpha-1.2.1.title: alpha-1.2.1

beta-1.3.0.description:
# Rabi-Ribi APWorld 1.3.0 Beta

## Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.

## To Install
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [Archipelago Releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Open **rabi_ribi.apworld** with Archipelago Launcher; it will be automatically installed to Archipelago's `custom_world` folder.

## To Generate a Game
1. Download **Rabi-Ribi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your Archipelago installation (by default, `C:\ProgramData\Archipelago`).
4. Navigate to the `Players` folder under your Archipelago base folder.
5. Move **Rabi-Ribi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Open the Archipelago Launcher and click the **Generate** button.
7. Your generated game will be in the `Output` folder in the Archipelago base folder.

## To Host a Game
1. Navigate to the [Host Game](https://archipelago.gg/uploads) page.
2. Upload the `.zip` file outputted from the above "To Generate a Game"

## To Start Playing
1. Make sure you have an Archipelago room from the previous "To Host a Game".
2. Open the Archipelago Launcher and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
3. Connect to the room via the room URL and port.
4. (First Time) When prompted, select the **Rabi-Ribi Installation Folder** on Steam. (This can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder)
5. (First Time, Optional) When prompted, select the **Rabi-Ribi Poptracker Pack** `.zip` file, available [here](https://github.com/rajanb/RabiRibiPoptracker). (This can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder)
6. Launch Rabi-Ribi through Steam.
7. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the Rabi-Ribi Client.
8. Start and have fun!

## Using Universal Tracker
Universal Tracker is fully supported in the Rabi-Ribi APWorld! This includes support for providing an external poptracker pack to enable a Map Tracker tab. You can get the latest poptracker pack [here](https://github.com/rajanb/RabiRibiPoptracker). If you are running Archipelago 0.6.2 or higher, the Map Tracker will also support showing your current location, represented by an Erina Badge.

Note: If you have used a previous version of the Rabi-Ribi APWorld, you may need to edit your `host.yaml` to set the location of the pack, with `ut_pack_path` under `rabi_ribi_options`.

## Other Notes
At this time, the only goal this randomizer supports is "Easter Egg Hunt", which are all local! The goal is NOT to complete the base game (although there is intention to add this later).

## What's Changed
* Rabi-Ribi: Add deathlink logic by @DavidBarringer in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/15
* Add Post-Game Locations by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/33
* Add Map Tracking with Universal Tracker by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/35
* Allow Higher Amounts of Easter Eggs as a Win Condition by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/38
* Move Reverse Rabi Slippers Wall Jump to HARD by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/40
* Add a command processor for the client. by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/42
* Add missing events to the event list by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/43
* Add Option to Apply Beginner Mod Patch by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/44

## New Contributors
* @DavidBarringer made their first contribution in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/alpha-1.2.1...beta-1.3.0
beta-1.3.0.title: 1.3.0 Beta

beta-1.3.1.description:

## Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.

## To Install
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [Archipelago Releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Open **rabi_ribi.apworld** with Archipelago Launcher; it will be automatically installed to Archipelago's `custom_world` folder.

## To Generate a Game

2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your Archipelago installation (by default, `C:\ProgramData\Archipelago`).
4. Navigate to the `Players` folder under your Archipelago base folder.
5. Move **Rabi-Ribi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Open the Archipelago Launcher and click the **Generate** button.
7. Your generated game will be in the `Output` folder in the Archipelago base folder.

## To Host a Game
1. Navigate to the [Host Game](https://archipelago.gg/uploads) page.

5. (First Time, Optional) When prompted, select the **Rabi-Ribi Poptracker Pack** `.zip` file, available [here](https://github.com/rajanb/RabiRibiPoptracker). (This can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder)

If you are running Archipelago 0.6.2 or higher, the Map Tracker will also support showing your current location, represented by an Erina Badge.

Note: If you have used a previous version of the Rabi-Ribi APWorld, you may need to edit your `host.yaml` to set the location of the pack, with `ut_pack_path` under `rabi_ribi_options`.

## Other Notes
At this time, the only goal this randomizer supports is "Easter Egg Hunt", which are all local! The goal is NOT to complete the base game (although there is intention to add this later).

## What's Changed
* Fix Issues Found in 1.3.0 by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/45


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/beta-1.3.0...beta-1.3.1

# Rabi-Ribi APWorld 1.4.0 Beta

## Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.

## To Install
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [Archipelago Releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Open **rabi_ribi.apworld** with Archipelago Launcher; it will be automatically installed to Archipelago's `custom_world` folder.

## To Generate a Game
1. Download **Rabi-Ribi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your Archipelago installation (by default, `C:\ProgramData\Archipelago`).
4. Navigate to the `Players` folder under your Archipelago base folder.
5. Move **Rabi-Ribi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Open the Archipelago Launcher and click the **Generate** button.
7. Your generated game will be in the `Output` folder in the Archipelago base folder.

## To Host a Game
1. Navigate to the [Host Game](https://archipelago.gg/uploads) page.
2. Upload the `.zip` file outputted from the above "To Generate a Game"

## To Start Playing
1. Make sure you have an Archipelago room from the previous "To Host a Game".
2. Open the Archipelago Launcher and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
3. Connect to the room via the room URL and port.
4. (First Time) When prompted, select the **Rabi-Ribi Installation Folder** on Steam. (This can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder)
5. (First Time, Optional) When prompted, select the **Rabi-Ribi Poptracker Pack** `.zip` file, available [here](https://github.com/rajanb/RabiRibiPoptracker). (This can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder)
6. Launch Rabi-Ribi through Steam.
7. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the Rabi-Ribi Client.
8. Start and have fun!

## Using Universal Tracker
Universal Tracker is fully supported in the Rabi-Ribi APWorld! This includes support for providing an external poptracker pack to enable a Map Tracker tab. You can get the latest poptracker pack [here](https://github.com/rajanb/RabiRibiPoptracker). If you are running Archipelago 0.6.2 or higher, the Map Tracker will also support showing your current location, represented by an Erina Badge.

Note: If you have used a previous version of the Rabi-Ribi APWorld, you may need to edit your `host.yaml` to set the location of the pack, with `ut_pack_path` under `rabi_ribi_options`.

## Other Notes
At this time, the only goal this randomizer supports is "Easter Egg Hunt", which are all local! The goal is NOT to complete the base game (although there is intention to add this later).

## What's Changed
* Bandaid fix for failed world generation when using include_post_game = true and include_warp_destination = false by @Peblo0110 in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/51
* Fix deathlink sending extra death at high health by @DavidBarringer in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/50
* Bug fixes by @Peblo0110 in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/55
* Additional Bug Fixes by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/53
* Fix Goal Sending Multiple Times by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/60
* Modify logic to respect darkness (Thank you kingdragonite) by @Peblo0110 in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/57
* Implementation of cross map check by @Peblo0110 in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/61
* Fix Several Logic Errors by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/63
* Fix common map issues and update starting warp area by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/64
* Update Client UT Implementation by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/65
* Add workflow to create APWorld by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/66

## New Contributors
* @Peblo0110 made their first contribution in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/51

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/beta-1.3.2...beta-1.4.0
beta-1.4.0.title: 1.4.0 Beta

beta-1.4.1.description:
## Quick Links
- [Game Info Page](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/blob/main/worlds/rabi_ribi/docs/en_Rabi-Ribi.md)
- [Setup Guide](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/blob/main/worlds/rabi_ribi/docs/setup_beta_en.md)
- [Known Issues](https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/issues?q=is%3Aissue%20state%3Aopen%20label%3Abug)

## Before Playing
This randomizer assumes the player is aware of hidden techniques that allow the game to be beaten without items, even at the lowest settings. It is HIGHLY recommended to play through the Basic section of the [Platforming Tricks Tutorial](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1706422414) before starting your first seed!

Additionally, the logic assumes that the player knows of hidden paths throughout the game, revealed with Ribbon, Fire Orb, or Carrot Bombs. A patch is available to expose these paths, alongside other useful features! It can be enabled by setting "Apply Beginner Mod" to `true`.

## What's Changed
* Fixes for Issues Found in Post-Game Testing by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/68
* Removed unused functions. by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/69
* Move Beta Setup Instructions to Git by @dclaganiere in https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/pull/72


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tdkollins/Archipelago-Rabi-Ribi/compare/beta-1.4.0...beta-1.4.1
beta-1.4.1.title: Rabi-Ribi APWorld 1.4.1 Beta

release-alpha-1.0.1.description:
## To install:
1. Download and install the latest archipelago release from the [archipelago releases page](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases).
2. Download **rabi_ribi.apworld** listed below.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \lib\worlds under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **rabi_ribi.apworld** into this folder.

## To generate a game:
1. Download **RabiRibi.yaml** below.
2. Edit the file to have your desired settings.
3. Navigate to your archipelago installation (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
4. Navigate to \players under your archipelago base folder.
5. Move **RabiRibi.yaml** into this folder (you can rename it if you wish).
6. Navigate back to your archipelago base folder and run **ArchipelagoGenerate.exe**
7. Your generated game will be in the \output folder under the archipelago base folder.

## To host a game:
1. Navigate to the [host game url](https://archipelago.gg/uploads)
2. Upload the zip file outputted from the above "To generate a game"

## To start playing:
1. Make sure you have an AP room from the previous "To host a game".
2. Navigate to your archipelago base folder (default C:\ProgramData\Archipelago).
3. Run **ArchipelagoLauncher.exe** and click "Rabi-Ribi Client".
4. On your first launch, the client should ask you to select your **Rabi-Ribi install folder** on steam (this can be changed later via the `host.yaml` file in your Archipelago base folder).
6. Connect to the room via the room URL.
7. Launch Rabi-Ribi (currently, only the latest version 2.0.1 is supported).
8. The logger should state something like "connect to <numbers>-<player-name> to start playing."
9. On the Rabi-Ribi main menu, press F5 and select the scenario listed in the log above.
10. Start and have fun!

## Changelog:
- Fixed bug where the game crashes when receiving an item from another player
release-alpha-1.0.1.title: AP Rabi-Ribi Alpha-1.0.1
